Class ReportingIO

java.lang.Object
ReportingIO
public class ReportingIO extends Object
The ReportingIO class is designed to provide an interface that allows the user to interact with the rest of the class, allowing them to both input data and retrieve data.

    void
    enterBranchData()
    The enterBranchData method allows the user to add a branch object to the Reporting class and gives the option to add sales to that branch

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)

    • menu

      public void menu()
      The menu method is designed to create an interactive menu that allows the user to select what they want to do, it will loop at the end of each task until the user decides to select the exit option.

    • enterBranchData

      public void enterBranchData()
      The enterBranchData method allows the user to add a branch object to the Reporting class and gives the option to add sales to that branch

    • enterSaleData

      public void enterSaleData(String branchName)
      Enter sale data allows the user to enter sale data about a specific sale and link it to a branch
      Parameters:
      branchName - - Type String - the name of the branch that the user wants to access (will be empty and asked for later unless supplied by a function call from the enterBranchData method)

    • highestAvg

      public void highestAvg()
      Finds the branch with the highest average sale and outputs it to the user

    • highestSale

      public void highestSale()
      Finds the highest sale and outputs it to the user

    • salesGreaterThan

      public void salesGreaterThan()
      Outputs to the console the list of Sales greater than a user specified value
